txt.en: Talk to Bingo in Draigoch's lair
Sneak by the sleeping dragon with Bingo
You failed, and Draigoch claims another victim!
Follow Bingo deeper into Draigoch's lair
Bingo has been defeated!
Bingo is inside the entrance to Draigoch's Lair, hoping to rescue Theodore Gorse before it is too late!
Haley has followed you to a ledge overlooking the sleeping dragon.
'Uh oh.'

'Oh dear... look at this poor fellow! This is not a safe place at all, [placeholder]. It seems burglars have come in here from time to time, and any that did not fall prey to the dragon's fire may have met their ends at the hands of those they brought with them! When treasure is involved, good friends can become enemies over the distribution of even a single coin.\n\n'But it is the dragon we should worry about for now!'
Theodore is on the floor of Draigoch's lair, and you need to climb down to reach him.
DNT - Blah!
Bingo is on the floor of Draigoch's lair, and he wants to talk to you about something urgent.

'I could not wait any longer, [placeholder], and it is a good thing I followed when I did, for you seem to have no way of descending from this ledge to the floor of the lair. How can you rescue Theodore if you cannot get down to him?

'Well, I have a coil of rope. I will tie it to a rock up here, and we can descend to the floor of the lair to save Theodore! We will have to be very, very quiet, so use caution!

'Now let me tie this rope!'
Nothing
You have found Theodore in Draigoch's lair!
'I see Theodore! He is down there, on the far side of the dragon!'
'Oh my.'
Bingo's voice is little more than a whisper.\n\n'Walk with care, [placeholder]. We do not want to wake this dragon.'
Haley uncoils her rope and ties it securely to a rocky outcrop
You have found Theodore in the depths of Draigoch's lair.

Theodore does his best to whisper.

'The Rothstone will be safe here, [placeholder]. May it give this dragon all the misfortune it can produce, and leave me and Haley alone!

'It is a funny thing, but I look around at all this treasure and I find that I don't desire even the smallest portion of it. Perhaps I am done being a Treasure Seeker after all. You did not need to come in after me, but I am touched all the same. I surrendered one treasure, but I found another treasure all the same: what good friends I have!

'We should make for the exit before this creature wakes, though. I know when I wake in the morning the first thing I want to have is a snack!'
'Over here!'
The dragon stirs awake!
'Hurry!'
The dragon is awake! You must make it to the rope before the lair fills with fire!
Figure out a plan to rescue Theodore
Talk to Theodore outside Draigoch's Lair
<rgb=#FF0000>Escape before the lair fills with fire</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Bingo must not be defeated</rgb>
Your luck has held so far. The dragon is asleep
'I say we get out of here... and right now!'
'Hello there, friends! Oh, oh, sorry. I will whisper... sssshhhhh...'
'Let's go, my friends! And quietly!'
'Whoa!'
You have escaped from the dragon's lair... but just in time!
'Run!'
'Haley, I think you should stay up here and see if Theodore comes in this way.'

'Well, that was close! Still, everything turned out all right, did it not? And I am glad to be rid of the Rothstone!\n\n'So what shall we do next, my adventurous friends? Theodore Gorse is ready for anything!'
'It could be that he has not arrived yet. It would not surprise me if he dawdled!'
'All right, Bingo. If you're sure.'
'Is that a village down there, across the plain? Let us head for it at once, and leave this dragon behind us!'
'[placeholder] and I will go see if he is already inside!'
'This way, [placeholder]!'
Bingo has entered the lair of the mighty Draigoch in order to rescue Theodore Gorse... if it is not already too late!
'Look out! This place is full of bugs!'
'Look at all this treasure! But there are so many bodies, too.'
'Watch your step here, [placeholder].'
'More bugs!'
Talk to Haley in Draigoch's lair
Climb down the rope to reach the floor of Draigoch's lair
Talk to Bingo on the floor of Draigoch's lair
'Careful, [placeholder]. There is another steep slope.'
Sneak by the sleeping dragon with Bingo
'I hope Theodore is all right. He is a likeable fellow, in his own way!'
Bingo has been defeated!
Talk to Theodore in Draigoch's lair
'These bugs are getting even larger!'
Stay alive!
'That one was pretty scary. Do you think the dragon will be that big?'
Run to the rope and escape from Draigoch's lair
'Watch your footing again, [placeholder]. It's pretty steep!'
Leave the lair with Theodore, Haley, and Bingo
'Get ready!'
Instance: Treasure Lost, Treasure Found
